column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A------ Mercedes was hit by a train at 3:25 pm on January 8
column6: Phnom Penh.------According to the owner of the vehicle
column7: he was driving a black Mercedes accompanied by two others
column8: to visit a friend. Nobody was injured.------After the incident
column9: the train company demanded $ 1000 in compensation from the car driver.
